title: 1975년 Thomas 사건
summary: 미국 New York, NY 법원 판결 사건. 사건명: Thomas. 판결일: 1975-07-23. 법원: Appellate Division of the Supreme Court of the State of New York.
description:
## 사건 정보

**사건명**: The People of the State of New York v. Gordon P. Thomas
**판결일**: 1975-07-23
**법원**: Appellate Division of the Supreme Court of the State of New York
**관할**: New York, NY

## 인용

- 49 A.D.2d 638

## 판결문 요약


Appeal by defendant, as limited by his motion, from a sentence of the Supreme Court, Kings County, imposed August 1, 1973, upon his conviction of robbery in the second degree, upon a plea of guilty, the sentence being a period of imprisonment of up to five years, to be served concurrently with a previously imposed term of imprisonment in a Federal *639penitentiary. Sentence reversed, on the law, and case remanded to Criminal Term for resentence. A sentence to a State penal institution cannot run concurrently with a previously imposed sentence to a Federal penitentiary (People v Schatz, 45 AD2d 853). Gulotta, P. J., Hopkins, Cohalan, Brennan and Munder, JJ., concur.
...
